content.text:
# Draft:Kalmyk invasion of Kabardia

Kabardia (East Circassia)
| combatant2        =  Kalmyk Khanate
| commander1        = Mutsal Sunchaleyevich Cherkassky
| commander2        =  Ho-Urluk Yelden Kirosan Kaltu Choktu Arkhuli Serene Toygun Sarambay Dayan-Erke LouzanMonchak
| strength1         = 1,500
| strength2         = 10,000-100,000
| casualties1       = Unknown
| casualties2       = Heavy losses; Ho-Urluk killed, sons Yelden and Kirosan, grandsons Kalta, Chokta, Arkhuli Serene, Toygun, Sarambai, and others killed
}}
The Kalmyk Campaign against Kabardia (1644) was a major offensive launched by Kalmyk ruler Ho-Urluk against the Kabardians in January 1644.
